entry.title: Flood Warning issued October 13 at 9:41AM EDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .Recent heavy rainfall over the Saint Johns basin has slowed the decline in levels at Astor, leading to a slight rise over the last 18 hours. entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued October 13 at 11:21AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Multiple Rounds of Soaking Rain with Localized Threat for Flooding This Afternoon through Saturday Morning... A strong fall weather system will bring periods of soaking rain to the area through Saturday morning. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 10:25AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Northwest Winds Today... Although these counties along the Highway 81 corridor are not currently included in a formal High Wind Warning given that speeds are expected to fall short of official criteria, it will still be quite windy today, with sustained northwest winds commonly 25 to 35 MPH and frequent gusts of 40 to 50 MPH.
